career.name: IT Business Analyst Specialist
career.title: IT Business Analyst Specialist
description: Streamlined business requirements gathering, producing over 1,200 pages of documentation and reducing project delivery time by 70%.
Implemented a reporting framework with Microsoft Power Platforms, creating over 100 dashboards to enable data-driven decisions.
Developed a Business Analyst training program, increasing team efficiency and skill development.

career.name: Council of Engineers Association
career.title: Data Scientist (Contract)
description: Conducted advanced data analysis and developed predictive models, providing actionable insights for key engineering projects.
Created visualizations and dashboards that translated complex data into clear, actionable insights to support decision-making.
Authored technical documentation for data models and algorithms, ensuring reproducibility and knowledge sharing across teams.

career.name: Digital Cash
career.title: Software Data Science Intern
description: Built and deployed an application focusing on RESTful services with Spring Boot in an agile setting.
Developed data pipelines for large datasets, optimizing data flow and integration.
Extracted insights from application data to drive improvements and support business objectives.
